description: This is an Angular service class that manages authentication processes, including login, logout, and token management.

classes.name: AuthService
classes.description: Angular service providing authentication functionalities such as login, logout, token validation, and fetching current user information.

methods.name: login
methods.description: Performs user login by sending credentials to the backend and storing the returned token and user information.

methods.name: logout
methods.description: Clears stored authentication data, effectively logging out the user.

methods.name: isAuthenticated
methods.description: Checks if there is a valid authentication token to determine if the user is authenticated.

methods.name: currentUser
methods.description: Returns the current user information if available, otherwise null.
